com.boomi.connector.auth

Class AWSEventBridgeAWS4SignerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.boomi.connector.auth.AWSEventBridgeAWS4Signer
      • com.boomi.connector.auth.AWSEventBridgeAWS4SignerImpl

  • public class AWSEventBridgeAWS4SignerImpl
extends AWSEventBridgeAWS4Signer
    This class helps to create the AWS4 signer demonstrating how to sign requests to Amazon Event Bridge using an 'Authorization' header.
    Author:
    a.kumar.samantaray

      Computes an AWS4 signature for a request as an 'Authorization' header.

    • Method Detail

      • computeSignature

        public java.lang.String computeSignature(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> headers,
                                         java.lang.String bodyHash,
                                         java.lang.String awsAccessKey,
                                         java.lang.String awsSecretKey)
        Computes an AWS4 signature for a request as an 'Authorization' header. It takes all the headers fields including Host,'X-Amz-Date',SHA256 Hashed value of Body content as 'X-Amz-Content-SHA256', Access key and Secrete key.
        Parameters:
        headers -
        queryParameters -
        bodyHash -
        awsAccessKey -
        awsSecretKey -
        Returns:
        The computed authorization string for the request. This value needs to be set as the header 'Authorization' on the subsequent HTTP request.
